contextId.occurrenceNote: Here "his" and "he" refer to the person bringing an offering to Yahweh. It can be translated in the second person as it is in [Leviticus 1:2](../01/02.md). Alternate translation: "If your offering ... you must offer" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-123person]])
contextId.glQuote: If his offering ... he must offer

contextId.occurrenceNote: Here "he" refers to the one making the offering. It can be stated in second person. Alternate translation: "Then you must kill the bull" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-123person]])
contextId.glQuote: Then he must kill the bull

contextId.occurrenceNote: Here "he" refers to the person offering the sacrifice. It can be stated in second person. Alternate translation: "Then you must cut it" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-123person]])
